1.title: Harvest Party Scandal

episode of.title: American Colony: Meet the Hutterites (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: NGC introduces the King Colony and their way of life. Today, unlike their ancestors, they have sophisticated farming equipment, and are constantly evolving and struggling to find balance yet preserve their treasured traditions.

2.title: The Shunning

episode of.title: American Colony: Meet the Hutterites (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: A visit from the elders in Canada shakes King Colony as they mete out the Hutterites' worst punishment, shunning, to Bertha and Rita, meaning that no one in the colony can speak to or associate with them even though they still live there.

3.title: Rockin' Road Trip

episode of.title: American Colony: Meet the Hutterites (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: The King Colony's young people, including Claudia, Clinton and Lisa, go to a wedding of their distant cousins in Canada to see kinfolks and explore the world outside the colony, and their secondary goal is finding a girlfriend for Wesley.

4.title: Battle of the Sexes

episode of.title: American Colony: Meet the Hutterites (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: Claudia upsets tradition at the colony by risking punishment to join in the men's outdoor work instead of staying inside and cleaning and cooking with the other females, and everyone there has a strong opinion about what she is doing.

5.title: Shoot to Kill

episode of.title: American Colony: Meet the Hutterites (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot:

6.title: ER Bound

episode of.title: American Colony: Meet the Hutterites (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: Glimpse a rite of passage for the Hutterite women as 17-year-old Tammy prepares for her very first cook and bake week.

7.title: Show Me the Money!

episode of.title: American Colony: Meet the Hutterites (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: Claudia and the girls sneak off to the slaughterhouse for a secret sewing session and craft dresses with bright colors and leopard prints.

8.title: Breaking the Law

episode of.title: American Colony: Meet the Hutterites (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: Toby has to work around the clock caring for the new-born calves and he needs some help, but Clinton is not ready to take any responsibility even with the colony's financial situation at stake, while Claudia is crushed after Bertha chooses to spend time w [sic].

9.title: We Are Not a Cult

episode of.title: American Colony: Meet the Hutterites (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot:

10.title: Barnburners

episode of.title: American Colony: Meet the Hutterites (TV Series 2012– )

10.plot: When the calving barn goes up in flames, Wesley and his cousins jeopardize their upcoming requests to get baptized and when Claudia hears from the college she applied to, her world starts to change.

-1.title: Shoot to Kill

episode of.title: American Colony: Meet the Hutterites (TV Series 2012– )

-1.plot: Carver's anger starts to boil when he goes hunting and can't get a deer, gets into a fight with a boy at school, and ultimately is suspended from school--will Carver be able to control his temper or will he completely go over the edge?

imdb.plot outline: Meet the Hutterites--a small religious colony in rural Montana who holds desperately to their sacred traditions while fighting the modern temptations of the outside world. King Colony is made up of 59 people and they are almost all related. This family lives together, works together, and worships God together, 7 days a week, 365 days a year, for their entire lives. And, like any family, this one doesn't always agree. Most of the colony is holding tight to the age-old traditions of their ancestors, while others are flirting with modern society.
imdb.title: American Colony: Meet the Hutterites

plot: Meet the Hutterites--a small religious colony in rural Montana who holds desperately to their sacred traditions while fighting the modern temptations of the outside world. King Colony is made up of 59 people and they are almost all related. This family lives together, works together, and worships God together, 7 days a week, 365 days a year, for their entire lives. And, like any family, this one doesn't always agree. Most of the colony is holding tight to the age-old traditions of their ancestors, while others are flirting with modern society.
